def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    count = 0

    while i <= j:
        if a[i] <= k:
            count += 1
            i += 1
        elif a[j] <= k:
            count += 1
            j -= 1
        else:
            break

    print(count)

main()

n, k = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

left = 0
right = n - 1

ans = 0
while left <= right:
    if a[left] <= k:
        ans += 1
        left += 1
    elif a[right] <= k:
        ans += 1
        right -= 1
    else:
        break

print(ans)

n, k = map(int, input().split())
problems = list(map(int, input().split()))

left = 0
right = n - 1
solved = 0

while left <= right:
    if problems[left] <= k:
        solved += 1
        left += 1
    elif problems[right] <= k:
        solved += 1
        right -= 1
    else:
        break

print(solved)
